catalog_script_client.name: Display fields based on product type
catalog_script_client.sys_name: Display fields based on product type

sys_update_version.name: catalog_script_client_9fda9acf1bee4110a4236313604bcbda
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>false</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>set</applies_to><cat_item/><cat_variable>IO:fd15c65e1b6a4d10a4236313604bcb7f</cat_variable><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>false</isolate_script><messages/><name>Display fields based on product type</name><order/><script><![CDATA[function onChange(control, oldValue, newValue, isLoading) 
{
   if (isLoading || newValue == '') 
   {
      return;
   }

	var request_support_for = g_form.getValue('request_support_for');
	var request_type = g_form.getValue('request_type');
	
	var cur_soldproduct = g_form.getValue('product_model');
	var cur_installbaseitem = g_form.getValue('serial_number');

	var ga = new GlideAjax('Support_case');
	ga.addParam('sysparm_name', 'getProductCategory');
	ga.addParam('sysparm_installbase', cur_installbaseitem);
	ga.getXML(getResponse);

	function getResponse(response) 
	{
		var answerproduct = response.responseXML.documentElement.getAttribute('answer');
	
		//g_form.addInfoMessage('Include answer: ' +answerproduct);
		
		if (request_support_for == 'onsite_technical_support') 
		{
			//show fields		
			g_form.setVisible('engine_state', true);
			g_form.setVisible('location', true);
			g_form.setVisible('tools_on_site', true);
			g_form.setVisible('on_site_intervention_requested_date', true);
			g_form.setVisible('order_reference_number', true);
			g_form.setVisible('warranty_number', true);
			g_form.setVisible('engine_dismantled', true);
			g_form.setVisible('engine_itself_dismantled', true);
			g_form.setVisible('attachments_snapshot', true);
	
			if (answerproduct == 'Diesel Engine') 
			{
				g_form.setMandatory('fuel_type', true);
				g_form.setMandatory('gas_type', false);
					
				g_form.setVisible('fuel_type', true);
				g_form.setVisible('gas_type', false);
			}
				
			if (answerproduct == 'Gas Engine') 
			{
				g_form.setMandatory('gas_type', true);
				g_form.setMandatory('fuel_type', false);
				g_form.setMandatory('lifting_bar_hoisting_gear', true);
				g_form.setMandatory('attachment_commissioning_protocol', true);
				g_form.setMandatory('cost_coverage', true);
					
				g_form.setVisible('gas_type', true);
				g_form.setVisible('fuel_type', false);
				g_form.setVisible('lifting_bar_hoisting_gear', true);
				g_form.setVisible('attachment_commissioning_protocol', true);
				g_form.setVisible('cost_coverage', true);
			}	
			
			if (answerproduct != 'Diesel Engine' && answerproduct != 'Gas Engine' ) 
			{
				g_form.setMandatory('gas_type', false);
				g_form.setMandatory('fuel_type', false);
				g_form.setVisible('fuel_type', false);
				g_form.setVisible('gas_type', false);
			}
	
			g_form.setMandatory('engine_state', true);
			g_form.setMandatory('location', true);
			g_form.setMandatory('tools_on_site', true);
			g_form.setMandatory('on_site_intervention_requested_date', true);
			g_form.setMandatory('order_reference_number', true);
			g_form.setMandatory('engine_dismantled', true);
			g_form.setMandatory('engine_itself_dismantled', true);
		}
	}
}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>michel.boberda@liebherr.com</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-04-03 21:23:15</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>9fda9acf1bee4110a4236313604bcbda</sys_id><sys_mod_count>8</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Display fields based on product type</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Support case" source="x_liisa_support_ca">80d47c06dba7f05001eafad3f3961926</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Support case">80d47c06dba7f05001eafad3f3961926</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_9fda9acf1bee4110a4236313604bcbda</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-04-16 16:51:47</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onChange</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set display_value="On Site Technical Support">af528ed61b6a4d10a4236313604bcb0d</variable_set><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>
